description:
Rizzoli & Isles are staying chained to each other.Rizzoli和Isles还要继续拷在一起了。

TNT has renewed the cop drama for Season 7, to air in summer 2016, the network announced Thursday.TNT电视网周四宣布续订这部警匪剧第七季，新季将会在2016年夏季回归。

The upcoming run will consist of 13 hours, the smallest episode order since its 10-episode freshman season.新季时长共13小时，这也是这部剧被续订的集数最少的一次，只有10集。

Rizzoli opened its current run in June with 4.4 million viewers and a 0.7 demo rating, and frequently leads basic cable in total viewership. At last tally, it pulled 4.2 mil and a 0.6. With On Demand, digital and mobile views factored in, the procedural is averaging 11.1 million viewers weekly.《妙女神探》6月正在播的本季的收视人数时440万，收视率0.7，在观众总数上在有线台中处于领军位置。有420万人收看了最新一集，若考虑数字移动端收视率，该剧平均每周收视人数有1110万人。

title: 《妙女神探》被续订 2016年夏季回归
